/* AuthGrpMapper.getAuthGrps [AuthGrp.xml] */ SELECT atg.auth_grp_no ,atg.auth_grp_no as id ,atg.auth_grp_nm ,atg.auth_grp_nm as label ,atg.remarks ,atg.use_yn ,(case when atg.use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end) as use_yn_nm ,'N' as setting_yn ,atg.create_user_id ,atg.create_dt ,atg.update_user_id ,atg.update_dt FROM com_auth_grp atg WHERE 1 = 1
AND (atg.auth_grp_no like #{keyword} + '%' or UPPER(atg.auth_grp_nm) like + #{keyword} + '%')
AND atg.use_yn = #{useYn}
AND atg.auth_grp_no != 1015
AND atg.auth_grp_no not in (1020, 1089)
AND atg.auth_grp_no not in (1020, 1089, 1015)
ORDER BY atg.auth_grp_no

/* AuthGrpMapper.getAuthGrpUserAuths [AuthGrp.xml] */ SELECT cag.auth_grp_no ,cag.auth_grp_nm FROM com_auth_grp cag INNER JOIN com_user_auth_grp cuag ON cag.auth_grp_no = cuag.auth_grp_no WHERE cag.use_yn = 'Y' AND cag.auth_grp_no != 1015
AND cuag.user_id = #{userId}

/* AuthGrpMapper.getAuthGrpDepts [AuthGrp.xml] */ WITH depttree as ( SELECT cd.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.p_dept_cd FROM com_dept cd WHERE 1=1 AND isnull(cd.p_dept_cd, '') = '' AND cd.use_yn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT cdd.dept_cd ,cdd.dept_nm ,cdd.p_dept_cd FROM com_dept cdd INNER join depttree ON cdd.p_dept_cd = depttree.dept_cd WHERE 1=1 AND cdd.use_yn = 'Y' ) SELECT depttree.dept_cd ,depttree.dept_nm ,depttree.p_dept_cd FROM depttree WHERE 1=1
AND (upper(depttree.dept_nm) like '%'+upper(#{keyword})+'%' or exists(SELECT 1 FROM com_auth_grp cag INNER JOIN com_dept_auth_grp cdag ON cag.auth_grp_no = cdag.auth_grp_no WHERE cdag.dept_cd = depttree.dept_cd AND cag.auth_grp_nm like '%' + #{keyword} + '%'))

/* AuthGrpMapper.getAuthGrpDeptAuths [AuthGrp.xml] */ SELECT cag.auth_grp_no ,cag.auth_grp_nm FROM com_auth_grp cag INNER JOIN com_dept_auth_grp cdag ON cag.auth_grp_no = cdag.auth_grp_no WHERE cag.use_yn = 'Y' AND cag.auth_grp_no != 1015
AND cdag.dept_cd = #{deptCd}
